characters.story: "TSIH!" the person takes charge and commands sharply - to attend to and serve, like a server!
"SIH!" the food commands sharply - to rear, raise, and feed the animals!
"BWOH?" the boat questions curiously - is that a liner, an ocean ship that moors?
"HAHNG?" the boat questions curiously - how to navigate, sail by aviation?
The boat bends down drooping - a light boat, a small craft and vessel.
"JYEN!" the supervising boat commands sharply - a warship, a battleship for the navy!
"TSAHNG!" the boat and storehouse sing cheerfully - the ship's cabin, business class seating!
"YEN?" the water questions curiously - flowing along, beside, and following the shore?
"CHYEN!" the metal belch sings cheerfully - lead, the element for pencils!
"HOO?" the pack of wild dogs questions curiously - is that a fox, a cunning animal?
"BAN!" the two chili peppers and melon command sharply - a petal, flower part used in bean sauce!
"YEE!" the water commands sharply - to brim over, overflow with yin iron resentment!
"SHYAH?" the sun questions curiously - is there spare time? The gods have leisure but can't carry themselves.
"SHYAH?" the weather questions curiously - is that a red sky with sunset clouds and braces?
The gas and sheep bend down drooping - oxygen, the element we breathe.
"FEN!" the gas sings cheerfully - the atmosphere, ambiance, and air around us!
"LYOO!" the gas and snowman command sharply - chlorine, the element to disinfect water!
"CHING!" the gas sings cheerfully - hydrogen, the lightest element floating up!
